commitMessage: @@@[FLINK-16667][python][client] Support the Python dependency configuration options in CliFrontend (#11702)

@@@[FLINK-19084] Remove deprecated methods from ExecutionConfig

This commit removes deprecated.  ineffective methods:
 - set/isFailTaskOnCheckpointError
 - disable/enableSysoutLogging
 - isLatencyTrackingEnabled

@@@[FLINK-22871][python] Support to specify python client interpreter used to compile jobs

This closes #16833.
